channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump calls for resignation of Fed governor in latest line of attack
item.description: President Trump is calling for the resignation of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook after a Trump ally accused her of making false statements on mort...

item.title: Swimmers are warned to avoid East Coast beaches as Hurricane Erin moves north
item.description: The National Hurricane Center is urging beachgoers to stay out of the water. Parts of North Carolina's Outer Banks are under mandatory evacuation orde...

item.title: How Attorney General Pam Bondi has reshaped the Justice Department to suit Trump
item.description: The New Yorker 's Ruth Marcus says Bondi has presided over the DOJ's most convulsive transition of power since Watergate, aggressively reversing polic...

item.title: Greetings from the Dubai airport, where a long layover can also be a destination
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Some Florida farmers reduce crops as deportation fears drive workers away
item.description: U.S. farmers are feeling the impact of Trump's immigration crackdown. In some communities, immigration raids have slowed farm operations. NPR reports ...

item.title: Texas Democrats seek ways to undo Republican redistricting effort
item.description: Texas Democrats are exploring other ways of undoing the Republican-led efforts to redistrict the state. This comes as the Texas House of Representativ...

item.title: Trump calls on Fed governor to resign after mortgage fraud allegations
item.description: President Trump called on Fed Governor Lisa Cook to resign on Wednesday after one of his appointees accused her of mortgage fraud.

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard revokes security clearances of 37 US intelligence officials
item.description: The director of national intelligence accuses the officials, who served under Biden and Obama, of politicising intelligence for partisan or personal g...

item.title: First domino in national redistricting fight likely to fall with Texas GOP poised for vote on maps
item.description: Texas’ Republican-led legislature is expected to approve new congressional maps that add five new House seats that the GOP could win.

item.title: As hurricane season collides with immigration agenda, fears increase for those without legal status
8/20: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: Hurricane Erin triggers evacuations in North Carolina. Also, inside the generational decline in alcohol use.

item.title: North Carolina working to secure shoreline ahead of Hurricane Erin
item.description: Preparations are underway in North Carolina's Outer Banks as Hurricane Erin threatens coastal flooding on its projected path up the East Coast. CBS Ne...

item.title: Denmark scraps book tax to fight 'reading crisis'
item.description: The government hopes abolishing the sales tax will encourage more people to buy books.

item.title: German controversy surrounds jail term for transgender far-right extremist
item.description: Marla-Svenja Liebich was sentenced two years ago to a total of one year and six months in prison without parole.

item.title: Watch: Fire rages at Milan airport check-in desk
item.description: Footage shared on social media shows a man knocked to ground after smashing an advertisement screen.

item.title: Judge declines to unseal grand jury material in Jeffrey Epstein case
item.description: A federal judge in New York on Wednesday declined the federal government's request to unseal grand jury material in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

item.title: Black Cowboy joy is spread by ‘Boots on the Ground’ viral line dance
Man sets fire to check-in area at Milan's Malpensa airport
item.description: The incident saw the partial evacuation of the terminal and may have a knock-on effect on departures.
